title: Fatal Search
description: In a quiet rural town, things are changing. Girls are missing, mutilated bodies are discovered. The race is on to save the lives of two girls who vanished in the blink of an eye. Will they be found in time? It turns personal when one of these girls turns out to be the daughter of Kacey's lifetime friend. Time is running out for young Katie as The Search leads the two detectives in a bi-state investigation which ends up focusing on an off the grid community. Can the answers be found there? Will the girls be found before it's too late? In the meantime, Katie faces the ultimate sacrifice.
author: Kristy S. Walker
